com.mgseb.wordgame.ui

Class ConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mgseb.wordgame.ui.ConsoleUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UI

    public class ConsoleUI
extends Object
implements UI
    Console based UI for the application. Here as backup in the event the graphical Swing UI fails.
    Author:
    fuksi

      • askQuestion

        public String askQuestion(Question question,
                 Difficulty difficulty)
        Displays question and handles user input. A partial look at the answer included.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to be displayed
        difficulty - dictates the degree of visibility of the partial answer
        Returns:
        user's guess

      • selectDifficulty

        public Difficulty selectDifficulty()
        Asks user to choose a difficulty setting. Overrules invalid input.
        Returns:
        difficulty chosen by the user

      • consequence

        public void consequence(boolean correctAnswer)
        Tells user whether or not the guess was the right answer.
        Parameters:
        correctAnswer - the correctness of the guess

      • score

        public void score()
        Displays user's overall score once game is over.

      • gameover

        public void gameover()
        Determines whether to start a new game. Does so through user input.
